name: ONE YEAR (Yosmi)
description:
//It might take a few minutes to load all music and art asset, go grab a cup of coffee ☕ :) , if it fails to load the game you can also try to download the EXE version for windows OS.

CONTROL:

P1 - Move (w,a,d), Attack (space), E (open the door to the next level)

P2: Move (arrows), Attack (ctrl), E (open the door to the next level)

INFO:

Welcome to play with your boyfriend or girlfriend, of course, you can solo to control 2 characters which are not that difficult when I tested.

This game is created as an anniversary for my girlfriend. I designed the characters and levels basing on our real stories in daily life. Feel free to play and experience our stories in the last 365 days. 

This game is created for the individual, so it might be hard for common players in certain puzzle levels. In level 2, you need to jump and make the "CALIX" into the green to unlock the hidden door (it's a restaurant name), apart from this one I believe you will have fun in the rest of my game! Follow my itch.io account for future video and the story behind the game design! 

Thanks for playing my game!

Br!

Yosmi

----------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Enemy and world tileset - @Pixel Frog

Music - soundimage.org

Inspiration - Katherine and our small cat
